JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Experienced and operational BI Specialist

Would you like to work with data solutions that enable Green Hydrogen Systems (GHS) to unlock real value and be an active player in the development and build-up of our GHS BI platform? Then you could be the new BI Specialist for GHS supporting the data driven and digital future.

 

The role

As BI Specialist you help translate data into insight and hereby support decision making in the business:

  • In collaboration with GHS Enterprise Architect making sure data connection from SAP and other sources to Power BI over Azure SQL and other components like Data Factory etc.
  • Work hands-on to build key components in our data warehouse
  • Establish data models suitable for BI and ensure the ability to deliver end-to-end reporting – from data collection to dashboard creation
  • Review, analyse, check integrity and presentation of data, information, and knowledge in the full value chain
  • Develop and optimize internal procedures and processes

 

Your profile

The right candidate has 5-7 years’ experience from a similar position and possesses a solid business understanding. We assume that you have an education as MSc. Business Intelligence/MSc. Data Science or similar combined with working experience within the BI field. You probably come from a larger company and have the desire to help build the BI function in a growing company.

As a person, you find it natural to see opportunities in relation to process optimization, development, and efficiency. Moreover, your characteristics are:

  • Analytical and business oriented
  • A strong team player
  • Ability to work independently, including committed and proactive in relation to task solution
  • Is trustworthy, responsible, and good at meeting deadlines
  • Possess a good eye for detail and the ability to go in depth with the tasks while keeping an overview

Generally, you have a flair for IT, are super user of Excel, Power BI and experience with Azure SQL, Data Factory etc. You master Danish and English in writing and speaking.

 

Collaboration and development in focus

As an employee at GHS, you get a unique opportunity to help make your mark on a company that is on a rising growth curve within one of the key technologies for optimal utilization of renewable energy.

The position is full-time with place of employment at GHS address in Kolding. GHS offers a salary that is in accordance with the nature of the position, requirements, and your background. Pension scheme and health insurance are also part of the salary package.

 

Application

We interview candidates on an on-going basis and would like to see you start as soon as possible. If you want to know more about the position, please contact Sandra Lillie at Blachman Search  +4553881499 or by mail sl@blachman.dk.

 

About Green Hydrogen Systems A/S (GHS)

Green Hydrogen Systems A/S (GHS) is ready to take a position as one of the world’s leaders in developing and producing electrolysis plants that use electricity from renewable energy and water to produce green hydrogen. Hydrogen is a cornerstone in the transition from fossils fuels to a low-carbon economy, and green hydrogen will play a central role in decarbonizing both industrial processes and economic sectors.
